patthana22.7:4.1: Nakusalaṃ nosaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.7:6.1: Nakusalaṃ noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.7:8.1: Nakusalaṃ nooghaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.7:10.1: Nakusalaṃ noyogaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.7:12.1: Nakusalaṃ nonīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.7:14.1: Nakusalaṃ noparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
